title: NA is such a monkey region srsly
body: I have actually never seen so many trolls, afks, and just straight dumb picks until i started playing on NA, is Gold the new Bronze? wtf is this region man someone explain this to me

replies.body: We’re the region of free speech and poor choices so get over it. It’s legal to make bad decisions here

Is mayonnaise an instrument?

I don’t know much about toxicity but I’m seriously curious about mayonaise
Monkeys eat bananas haven't heard of a monkey eating mayonnaise tbh
Yeah... I watch alot of Rat IRL who plays on euw... it makes me pretty envious to see how even when he's playin in low elo the players always seem to want to win. Must be nice : /
